name: Lost in the Dungeon (itch) (KakuGames)
description:
Hi, this is Kaku! 

As my second game I decided to go for a RPG game, I really felt like doing a more complex project,  mechanically and  technically speaking (those  improvements can be percieved when playing, of course). Even though it's just one level I think it ended up being pretty fun and challenging, so I hope you enjoy what this little RPG has to offer!
